titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that on September 11, 2002, the people of the United States should reaffirm the principles for which the Nation was founded so that freedom may ring from every community in the Nation and be heard around the world.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 9/10/2002--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that on September 11, 2002, the people of the United States should reaffirm the principles for which the Nation was founded so that freedom may ring from every community in the Nation and be heard around the world.
